Our Fleet

Discover the perfect ride for your next event! Our diverse fleet offers something for every group size and occasion. All vehicles are maintained to the highest standards for safety and comfort.

Mini Party Bus

Seats up to 10 guests

Perfect for small groups and intimate celebrations. Enjoy a cozy ride with premium sound and lighting.

Sprinter Party Van

Seats up to 14 guests

A stylish van for mid-sized parties, featuring plush seating and a sleek interior for a VIP experience.

Classic Party Bus

Seats up to 20 guests

Spacious and fun, this bus is ideal for birthdays, bachelor/bachelorette parties, and more.

Luxury Limo Bus

Seats up to 24 guests

Arrive in style with leather seating, LED lights, and a state-of-the-art sound system.

Executive Coach

Seats up to 30 guests

Perfect for corporate outings or large groups, with ample space and comfort.

Mega Party Bus

Seats up to 40 guests

The ultimate party on wheels—dance floor, bar area, and room for everyone!

Charter Bus

Seats up to 50 guests

Great for big events, weddings, and group travel. Comfortable, reliable, and fun.

Stretch Limo

Seats up to 8 guests

Classic elegance for proms, weddings, or a night out. Enjoy privacy and luxury.

Not sure which vehicle is right for you?

Contact our team and we’ll help you find the perfect fit for your group and occasion.
